title: Apple Inc. stock rises Wednesday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       inched 0.06% higher to $189.41 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 0.95% to 15,756.64 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.40% to 38,677.36. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. Apple Inc. closed $10.21 short of its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       rose 2.11% to $414.05, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 0.87% to $146.68, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 1.00% to $145.54. Trading volume (51.4 M) remained 3.2 million below its 50-day average volume of 54.5 M.
